title: TIFFANY & LOVE by Tiffany, EAU DE PARFUM SPRAY 1.7 OZ
description: Tiffany & Love Eau de Parfum for Her is a woody floral fragrance, modern as well as feminine. Both pay tribute to modern love and share a common key element: the glaucous sequoia . This vibrant woody aroma unifies the two fragrances, in homage to the various ways in which love unites two people.
